author: Special Correspondent
text:
The two-day Tamil Nadu State-level placement programme for students of self-financing engineering colleges in Madurai zone of the Anna University, Chennai, got underway at the Mahendra Engineering College, Mallasamudram, here on Monday.

The event was organised by the Centre for University-Industry Collaboration of Anna University, Chennai, in association with Mahendra Engineering College.

Cognizant Technology Solutions recruited the candidates. Students pursuing final year B.E or B.Tech in CSE, ECE, EEE, EIE, ICE and IT streams and who will pass out in 2015-16 participated.

No arrears

The students with CGPA of 7.49 or more with no standing arrears in all the semesters so far were allowed to participate in the campus drive.

The students appeared for the online test, technical round and finally HR round. The selected list will be published in the Anna University website soon, official sources said. The programme was inaugurated by M.G. Bharathkumar Chairman, Mahendra Engineering College, in the presence of T. Thiyagarajan, Director, Anna University.
title: State-level job fair held in Namakkal
